activities.desc: TiDB Incubator Program is designed to ensure that new projects in the TiDB ecosystem can obtain resources and help from the community towards their desired maturity level.
activities.title: TiDB Incubator Program

activities.desc: The theme of Hackathon this year is [∞], by which we expect participants to innovate, to challenge, and to unlock the infinite power of TiDB.
activities.title: TiDB Hackathon 2020

activities.desc: High Performance TiDB Challenge is a mentoring program which focuses on workload optimization to bring TiDB performance to a higher level!
activities.title: High Performance TiDB Challenge

activities.desc: Meet other TiDB Community members IRL and online. Meet like-minded friends, share practical cases and technical experience.
activities.title: Meet the TiDB Community

banner.desc: Join our community to learn, contribute, grow, and connect with TiDB contributors and users all around the world!
banner.title: Let’s build the database of the future together!

career.desc: Here you can find attractive job opportunities posted by TiDB users. It’s free to post and apply for a job. Wish you the best of luck in your search!
career.title: Career

items.desc: Development workflow, commit message formatting, contact points and other resources.
items.title: Contributing Guide

items.desc: Learning knowledge and skills, sharing best practices, become a database expert, develop database standards.
items.title: Join Developer Group

items.desc: Agreement on rules of behaviour for the members of TiDB Community.
items.title: Code of Conduct

desc: PingCAP University is committed to cultivating first-class talents in developing, managing and applying distributed relational database systems. All training and certification courses are designed and taught by the official TiDB technical experts of PingCAP.
You can also read the official document to learn the usage of TiDB.
learning.title: Learn How to Use TiDB

userGroup.desc: TUG (TiDB User Group) is an independent, self-organized, and non-profit organization that gathers the database and big data technology practitioners around the world. In TUG, you can increase your personal influence, open up your horizons and make like-minded friends.
userGroup.title: Join User Group
